activities:
DTS Inc. is a provider of state-of-the-art audio technology. DTS Inc. is a provider of personal services with customers and end users located in the European Economic Area and Switzerland.  DTS Inc. receives personally identifiable information from its customers, including registration, contact and payment information.  Any personal information collected, processed, used, and transferred is subject to its website Privacy Policy and its Safe Harbor Policy.
DTS Inc. has employees in the European Economic Area and Switzerland and may receive personal data relating to employees (whether temporary, permanent, part-time or contract), former employees, independent contractors, or job applicants who are also residents of the European Economic Area or Switzerland.
